DEMO_302_MSG_010: ́Boss! I'm sorry! He slipped away again! He sure is fast on his feet!
DEMO_302_MSG_020: ̃How annoying! This bloke's been botherin' us every single day!
DEMO_302_MSG_040: ́Hey! How'd you get in here!? And which gang are you sidin' with?
DEMO_302_MSG_050: ́Don't try any funny business in front of the Boss, capiche!?
DEMO_302_MSG_060: ̃Enough! He doesn't look like one o' them! Don't be goin' round threatenin' normal civilian folk!
DEMO_302_MSG_090:
̃It's you... you're ȁ, aren't you?
... You came seeking Lucia, didn't you?
DEMO_302_MSG_100:
̃Unfortunately... Lucia is no longer here. She headed off towards the Darkiron Bastille quite some time ago.
ā
DEMO_302_MSG_110: ̃Lucia is a very close friend of mine. She'd asked me to follow after her once you'd arrived.
DEMO_302_MSG_120:
̃However, once Lucia departed, the Transport Device leading to the Darkiron Bastille became inoperational soon after...
ā
DEMO_302_MSG_130: ̃I intended to fix it myself, but we've got bigger fish to fry at the moment around here...
DEMO_302_MSG_140: ̃Tell ya what! You lend us a hand in our dilemma, and I'll help you find Lucia right after, yeah?
DEMO_302_MSG_150:
̃We're in the midst of a civil war with the Eastern Polar Park's leader, Yetas.
ā
DEMO_302_MSG_160: ̃I'd like you to head over there and tell Yetas that we want to end this once and for all.
DEMO_302_MSG_180:
̃Yetas is also indebted to Lucia. If you go and show your face over there, then we can surely end this dispute!
ā
DEMO_302_MSG_190: ̃Gah! I'm begging you, please head over to Eastern Polar Park and talk some sense into Yetas!
DEMO_302_MSG_200:
̃By the way... you've yet to recall the ability to swim with your monsters, am I right?
ā
DEMO_302_MSG_210:
̃The only way to reach East Polar Park at this time is through an underwater tunnel in a lake.
ā
DEMO_302_MSG_220: ̃There is a Monolith to the southwest. Head there before trying to reach East Polar Park to master this new swimming ability.
DEMO_302_MSG_230: ̃I'll make sure my henchmen let you through. We're all countin' on you, ȁ.
